h3.a: ODPS Suspends 8th Grade Reading Proficiency Test

div.p:
The Oklahoma Department of Public Safety has waived the Reading Proficiency Test for the 2020 8th Graders. Students will not need the reading proficiency test to get their drivers learner permit. Click the link from KFOR to read the statement from DPS.
https://kfor.com/news/local/dps-waiving-certain-drivers-license-requirements-for-those-under-18/
